channel.title: Celery on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo
channel.description: Recent content in Celery on Even - A super concise theme for Hugo

item.title: Celery Cannot connect to amqp
item.description: Celery 提示[ERROR/MainProcess] consumer: Cannot connect to amqp://guest: @127.0.0.1:5672//: [Errno 61] Connection refused. 解决方法：需要启动rabbitmq-server sudo rabbitmq-server -detached Check the installation 1 2 3 ps -aux|grep rabbitmq # or
